EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Turbonomic Community Appreciation Giants vs Rockies
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On behalf of Steve Corndell, Vice President at Turbonomic, we are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on September 19th, as the San Francisco Giants take on the Colorado Rockies. We are expecting a fantastic summer evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, baseball. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry. San Francisco Giants vs Colorado Rockies <[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]>
Where: AT&T Park 24 Willie Mays Plaza, San Francisco, CA 94107 Thursday, September 19th 7:12pm
<[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
